name: AlgVis
tagline: Visualization of sorting and searching algorithms using Java 2D libraries.
body:
### Welcome to AlgVis.
AlgVis was the final project for our Software Construction course on which me and my class mate Ugur Cem OZTURK worked on.

![](http://i.imgur.com/eQDEnmw.jpg)

![Bubble Sort](http://i.imgur.com/0rG20Ju.gif)

![Selection Sort](http://i.imgur.com/objfhXB.gif)

![Binary Search](http://i.imgur.com/pAZUMAo.gif)

### Authors and Contributors
Ugur ILTER (@ugurilter) 
Ugur Cem OZTURK (@ugurcemozturk)
